name: 陳麗娟
objective:
本課程講授英美契約法。其他資訊請參閱英文概述。
This course teaches basic rules of contract law applied in the United States. While contract law is a law of a state, this course does not focus on any specific jurisdiction. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.
schedule:
Introduction to Contract Law
Prof. Dr. Li-Jiuan Chen-Rabich, LLM

I.　　2022/02/23　　Introduction 
II.　　2022/03/02　　Basic Concept of Contractual Relationship
